Articles.Content:
Hello, I just installed Realism Overhaul and whenever I try to load the game it gets stuck on ModuleManager.

Any help would be appreciated.

https://gyazo.com/afbf9a46fd7fd6b2122e6405995ec713

2 hours ago, Exilationz said:

Hello, I just installed Realism Overhaul and whenever I try to load the game it gets stuck on ModuleManager.

Any help would be appreciated.

https://gyazo.com/afbf9a46fd7fd6b2122e6405995ec713

 

Hi do you have the latest version of Module manager?  Do you only have one copy?  Module manager itself is one of the most trouble free mods on the planet, and problems with it are usually related to incorrect or bad installs,  or patch  problems.   Check you only have one copy, many mods bundle it, especially if ckan distributed. This one version of Module manager needs to live in the gamedata folder,  just the raw dll. 
A zipped copy of your ksp.log would be far more helpful in diagnosing yopur issue than a screenshot.
